prompts: Create a robust fighting-type Pokemon with powerful arms and a distinct pink color scheme.
Show me a humanoid Pokemon that carries heavy objects and has a strong physique.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves from a more basic form and has a gym-training vibe.
Design a Pokemon with a unique balance of strength and agility in its battle style.
Give me a visual of a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a friendly personality.
Generate a character that symbolizes hard work and determination in the Pokemon world.
Make a Pokemon that has a playful yet tough demeanor, perfect for training.
